DHB worker Daniel Tanielu’s immediate regret after drunkenly poking officer in bottom on night out in Hamilton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dhb-worker-daniel-tanielus-immediate-regret-after-drunkenly-poking-officer-in-bottom/VYIWILUBJRDWFGS3NDYMZCWD6M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dhb-worker-daniel-tanielus-immediate-regret-after-drunkenly-poking-officer-in-bottom/VYIWILUBJRDWFGS3NDYMZCWD6M/ Belinda FeekPolice said there was 'an application of force' which left the officer feeling violated. Wed, 07 Aug 2024 08:00:00 +0000 A Te Whatu Ora employee had his application for a discharge without conviction - on a charge of indecent assault of a police officer - dismissed by Judge Glen Marshall in the Hamilton District Court.
Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Jurors hear defendant in his own words as police interview played https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-jurors-hear-defendant-in-his-own-words-as-police-interview-played/U7YXHIMVBRBO3NDL2BJRGO5NZI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-jurors-hear-defendant-in-his-own-words-as-police-interview-played/U7YXHIMVBRBO3NDL2BJRGO5NZI/ Craig KapitanThe Auckland eye surgeon is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna. Wed, 07 Aug 2024 07:29:35 +0000 The eye surgeon was interviewed by Detective Ilona Walton on the morning he reported Pauline Hanna dead, April 5, 2020.

Wed, 07 Aug 2024 07:04:34 +0000 The Horowhenua District Council has distributed bottled water to Tokomaru School and Tokomaru Early Childhood Centre.

Rau Tongia: Jury reaches verdict with two found guilty of murderhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rau-tongia-jury-reaches-verdict-with-two-found-guilty-of-murder/WYFIYQEHRRDLPNUEM7TWYBSAIM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rau-tongia-jury-reaches-verdict-with-two-found-guilty-of-murder/WYFIYQEHRRDLPNUEM7TWYBSAIM/The jury has reached a unanimous verdict. Wed, 07 Aug 2024 06:22:01 +0000 Shayde Weston, Breeze Hunt-Weston, Louise Kelly Hume, and Pania Waaka all pleaded not guilty to the murder of Rau Tongia. Composite photo / NZME
NZ Post truck catches fire in Te Kūiti, with 2000 parcels destroyed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-post-truck-catches-fire-in-te-kuiti-with-2000-parcels-destroyed/QOFDKNCV6NH65G5F3WGVGYF4YE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-post-truck-catches-fire-in-te-kuiti-with-2000-parcels-destroyed/QOFDKNCV6NH65G5F3WGVGYF4YE/ The truck caught fire in Te Kūiti in the early hours of July 31.Wed, 07 Aug 2024 06:04:08 +0000 About 2000 parcels have been destroyed after an NZ Post truck caught fire last week. Photo / NZ Post
Unexplained Northland beach death: Husband says he wasn’t involved as Jo Sione-Lauaki’s funeral held in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/unexplained-northland-beach-death-husband-says-he-wasnt-involved-as-jo-sione-lauakis-funeral-held-in-auckland/IEJ7DW2SYVHB7P4HSJ2TPUV7VQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/unexplained-northland-beach-death-husband-says-he-wasnt-involved-as-jo-sione-lauakis-funeral-held-in-auckland/IEJ7DW2SYVHB7P4HSJ2TPUV7VQ/ Cherie Howie"Because I’m Black Power, they instantly think, ‘Oh, he’s done that'."
